$interpreted: : 29 Years Ago
Flustered Student: Professor Clovis, the fire hasn't been put out yet. You can't go in there!
Aosta: Get out of my way!
Aosta: Professor Dietrich! Professor Dietrich!
Aosta: This can't be. The professor's formula should have been absolutely perfect. This shouldn't have happened!
Aosta: Professor! Where are you!?
Aosta: Nothing, there's nothing...!
Uzziah: Don't waste your breath.
Uzziah: Your teacher, his body has already collapsed. But as for his soul...it's right here in this crystal.
Aosta: Quit joking around!
Aosta: Where have you hidden the professor!? Give me back my teacher!
Uzziah: A joke...yes, it is indeed a joke. Told by fate...
Uzziah: But, even if it was an accident, you cannot let this ominous existence pass you by.
Aosta: Professor, where are you?
Aosta: I don't believe it. It's impossible. There's no way the professor's experiment would go wrong...
Aosta: Professor couldn't be wrong...give my teacher back to me...
Aosta: You!?
Uzziah: A body that has dissipated cannot be remolded, but...
Aosta: Are these...runes? I've never seen these...
Uzziah: I've already stabilized the crystal. The rest depends on your persistence.
Aosta: What does that mean!?
Aosta: Are you saying there's a way to save the professor!? How?
Uzziah: This is not my responsibility. I can only help you up to this point.
Aosta: Wait. Who are you? Why do you want to help me?
Uzziah: ...I once hoped to save someone. That's all.
Aosta: No matter how long it takes. I will resurrect you, Professor Dietrich.
Aosta: There are still so many things...I need to learn from you...
Zola: Oh~This is the Rune Academy's Library of Forbidden Texts?
Zola: Looks rather wretched, doesn't look like much~
Aosta: Stop. You have absolutely no idea of the value of this research!
Zola: Watch your tone.
Morris: You have a brain. Use it. Otherwise, get the hell out of here.
Zola: As you wish, Immortal.
Zola: Though I'm rather curious. Why did you only spare him? Was it merely because he is your student?
Morris: Because whatever I say, he does.
Morris: You're as intelligent as an Immortal, surely you know how to use a chimp effectively?
Aosta: ......
Zola: ......Hehe, please continue, Immortal.
Morris: Hmph. Not impressive.
Morris: This is the headmaster's key, taken from Balzac. It should...
Aosta: It worked!
Morris: The Academy's Library of Forbidden Texts. Full of books that if taken by idiots, would unleash massive amounts of dangerous material.
Morris: So it's not open to students. Even if the teaching staff wants to use it for research, they must receive permission from the headmaster.
Morris: I have researched most of what's hidden here, except for the Forbidden Rune...
Morris: Let's go. It's time to experiment.
Zola: Wait.
Aosta: ...What is it now?
Zola: Such a rare opportunity. It would be a shame to return empty-handed.
Zola: This many forbidden texts, if there's just one or two that record some knowledge that the sect wishes to remain hidden...
Morris: ...Perhaps you want to destroy this place?
Aosta: What!?
Zola: It's so delightful talking with you, Morris Dietrich. That was precisely my meaning.
Aosta: Ignorant fool! The knowledge stored here, countless scholars poured their lives into this to——
Zola: Might as well, right?
Zola: Compared to what the Immortals know, these things are not even worth mentioning.
Morris: ...Monkey. Do as the woman says.
Aosta: But, Professor! Your own painstaking effort is stored here——
Morris: Did I ask you for your opinion?
Aosta: ......
Morris: Over there, burn that as well.
Zola: Hehe...I'll wait outside.
Morris: Do it, baboon.
Aosta: ......
Aosta: Professor, using an ancient seed for an experiment at this time is much too dangerous.
Morris: If it can uncover Truth, a little danger means nothing!
Aosta: ...*cough*...*cough*...
Aosta: Professor Dietrich, are you okay...
Morris: Look, Clovis. We have succeeded.
Morris: These results will surely shut the stupid mouths of those useless Applied Magic scholars...
Aosta: (Professor has already returned...)
Aosta: (This is what I wanted. Working for others is not an issue, but why do I still feel like you're so far away, Professor...)

Model.Text: 29 Years Ago
Professor Clovis, the fire hasn't been put out yet. You can't go in there!
Get out of my way!
Professor Dietrich! Professor Dietrich!
This can't be. The professor's formula should have been absolutely perfect. This shouldn't have happened!
Professor! Where are you!?
Nothing, there's nothing...!
Don't waste your breath.
Your teacher, his body has already collapsed. But as for his soul...it's right here in this crystal.
Quit joking around!
Where have you hidden the professor!? Give me back my teacher!
A joke...yes, it is indeed a joke. Told by fate...
But, even if it was an accident, you cannot let this ominous existence pass you by.
Professor, where are you?
I don't believe it. It's impossible. There's no way the professor's experiment would go wrong...
Professor couldn't be wrong...give my teacher back to me...
You!?
A body that has dissipated cannot be remolded, but...
Are these...runes? I've never seen these...
I've already stabilized the crystal. The rest depends on your persistence.
What does that mean!?
Are you saying there's a way to save the professor!? How?
This is not my responsibility. I can only help you up to this point.
Wait. Who are you? Why do you want to help me?
...I once hoped to save someone. That's all.
No matter how long it takes. I will resurrect you, Professor Dietrich.
There are still so many things...I need to learn from you...
Oh~This is the Rune Academy's Library of Forbidden Texts?
Looks rather wretched, doesn't look like much~
Stop. You have absolutely no idea of the value of this research!
Watch your tone.
You have a brain. Use it. Otherwise, get the hell out of here.
As you wish, Immortal.
Though I'm rather curious. Why did you only spare him? Was it merely because he is your student?
Because whatever I say, he does.
You're as intelligent as an Immortal, surely you know how to use a chimp effectively?
......Hehe, please continue, Immortal.
Hmph. Not impressive.
This is the headmaster's key, taken from Balzac. It should...
It worked!
The Academy's Library of Forbidden Texts. Full of books that if taken by idiots, would unleash massive amounts of dangerous material.
So it's not open to students. Even if the teaching staff wants to use it for research, they must receive permission from the headmaster.
I have researched most of what's hidden here, except for the Forbidden Rune...
Let's go. It's time to experiment.
Wait.
...What is it now?
Such a rare opportunity. It would be a shame to return empty-handed.
This many forbidden texts, if there's just one or two that record some knowledge that the sect wishes to remain hidden...
...Perhaps you want to destroy this place?
What!?
It's so delightful talking with you, Morris Dietrich. That was precisely my meaning.
Ignorant fool! The knowledge stored here, countless scholars poured their lives into this to——
Might as well, right?
Compared to what the Immortals know, these things are not even worth mentioning.
...Monkey. Do as the woman says.
But, Professor! Your own painstaking effort is stored here——
Did I ask you for your opinion?
Over there, burn that as well.
Hehe...I'll wait outside.
Do it, baboon.
Professor, using an ancient seed for an experiment at this time is much too dangerous.
If it can uncover Truth, a little danger means nothing!
...*cough*...*cough*...
Professor Dietrich, are you okay...
Look, Clovis. We have succeeded.
These results will surely shut the stupid mouths of those useless Applied Magic scholars...
(Professor has already returned...)
(This is what I wanted. Working for others is not an issue, but why do I still feel like you're so far away, Professor...)
